import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Col, Form, Row, Table, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './style/ListPage.css' class ListPage extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state={ }; //this.rowDeleteById = this.rowDeleteById.bind(this); } showListView(place_list) { let tbody = []; for (var i = 0; i < place_list.length; i++) { let row = {place_list[i].name} {place_list[i].address} {place_list[i].rating} tbody.push(row) } return tbody; } render() { return ( <>
{this.showListView(this.props.state.touristPlace)}
NAME ADDRESS RATING PICTURE ACTION
Lalbag Fort Lalbag 1
Mahastangar Gor Bogura 1
Mahastangar Gor Bogura 1
); } } export default ListPage;
